xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description:
This modules defines a set of functions for managing collections that are declared in the prolog of a module. For example, it provides functions to create, delete, or introspect collections.
This module is part of Zorba's XQuery Data Definition Facility. All the collections managed by this module have to be pre-declared in the prolog of a module. Please refer to the general documentation for more information and examples.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Nicolae Brinza, Matthias Brantner, David Graf, Till Westmann, Markos Zaharioudakis

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets the QNames of the collections that have been statically declared and are available, if any.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence comprising one QName for each statically declared and available collection or an emtpy sequence if no such collections are available.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: cddl:available-collections
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function cddl:available-collections() as xs:QName* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name The of the collection to create.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, creates a collection with the given name.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: zerr:ZDDY0001 if $name is not equal to any of the declared collections in the static context.
zerr:ZDDY0002 if a collection with $name already exists.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: cddl:create
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare updating function cddl:create($name as xs:QName) external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Creates a collection and adds the given sequence as content to the new collection.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name The name of the collection to create.
$content The sequences of items (nodes or JSON items) to be added to the new collection.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, creates a collection with the given name and inserts the given items into it.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: zerr:ZDDY0001 if $name is not equal to any of the declared collections in the static context.
zerr:ZDDY0002 if a collection with $name already exists.
zerr:ZDTY0001 if $content does not match the expected type declared by the collection according to the rules for SequenceType Matching.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: cddl:create
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare updating function cddl:create($name as xs:QName, $content as item()*) external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets the collections that have been declared in the prolog of the static context.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of QNames, one for each collection created in the static context, or an emtpy sequence.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: cddl:declared-collections
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function cddl:declared-collections() as xs:QName* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, deletes the collection with the given name.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: zerr:ZDDY0001 if $name is not equal to any of the declared collections in the static context.
zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection identified by $name is not available.
zerr:ZDDY0013 if the domain or key expression of any of the available indexes access the collection having $name.
zerr:ZDDY0015 if any of the in-scope variables references an item that belongs to the collection having $name

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: cddl:delete
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare updating function cddl:delete($name as xs:QName) external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets whether a collection is statically declared and available.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name The name of the collection to check.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: true if the collection was statically declared and is available; false otherwise.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: cddl:is-available-collection
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function cddl:is-available-collection($name as xs:QName) as xs:boolean external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gers whether a collection was declared in the prolog of the static context.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name The name of the collection to check.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: true if the collection was declared; false otherwise.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: cddl:is-declared-collection
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function cddl:is-declared-collection($name as xs:QName) as xs:boolean external
